answers.answer: Havent had that problem....call ur ob?
mabey your sense of smell changed. mine has. or mabey it was something you ate.
Sweet smelling urine can be an indication of diabetes. Ask your Dr to be sure all is well. Have you had a glucose test yet?

question: This is a serious question.... For the past few days when I go to pee it smells sweet and call me crazy but for some reason the smell reminds me a little like baby oil. No I do not use baby oil on my body so it can't be that. Has any one had this problem before when they pee? What could it be?
title: bathroom question
